53.eng-name: The Book of Paradise, its Description, its Bounties and its Inhabitants

hadiths.text: Abu Huraira reported Allah's Apostle (ﷺ) as saying:The fire which sons of Adam burn is only one-seventieth part of the Fire of Hell. His Companions said: By Allah, even ordinary fire would have been enough (to burn people). Thereupon he said: It is sixty-nine parts in excess of (the heat of) fire in this world each of them being equivalent to their heat

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي شِدَّةِ حَرِّ نَارِ جَهَنَّمَ وَبُعْدِ قَعْرِهَا وَمَا تَأْخُذُ مِنَ الْمُعَذَّبِينَ
chapter.eng-name: About Hell - May Allah Protect Us From It
